body_html:
Sorry, my module was actually ill-configured, and LD_LIBRARY_PATH was not correct.

Now, the error is with libcaffe2

ldd: warning: you do not have execution permission for `./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so'
./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.14' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
	linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00002aaaaaaab000)
	libcaffe2.so => not found
	libpthread.so.0 => /lib64/libpthread.so.0 (0x00002aaaaada3000)
	libglog.so.0 => not found
	libstdc++.so.6 => /cm/shared/apps/gcc/4.8.1/lib64/libstdc++.so.6 (0x00002aaaaafc0000)
	libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00002aaaab2c3000)
	libgcc_s.so.1 => /cm/shared/apps/gcc/4.8.1/lib64/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00002aaaab547000)
	libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00002aaaab75d000)
	/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x0000003c5b200000)

body:
Sorry, my module was actually ill-configured, and `LD_LIBRARY_PATH` was not correct.

Now, the error is with libcaffe2

    ldd: warning: you do not have execution permission for `./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so'
    ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so: /lib64/libc.so.6: version `GLIBC_2.14' not found (required by ./caffe2_pybind11_state.cpython-36m-x86_64-linux-gnu.so)
    	linux-vdso.so.1 =>  (0x00002aaaaaaab000)
    	libcaffe2.so => not found
    	libpthread.so.0 => /lib64/libpthread.so.0 (0x00002aaaaada3000)
    	libglog.so.0 => not found
    	libstdc++.so.6 => /cm/shared/apps/gcc/4.8.1/lib64/libstdc++.so.6 (0x00002aaaaafc0000)
    	libm.so.6 => /lib64/libm.so.6 (0x00002aaaab2c3000)
    	libgcc_s.so.1 => /cm/shared/apps/gcc/4.8.1/lib64/libgcc_s.so.1 (0x00002aaaab547000)
    	libc.so.6 => /lib64/libc.so.6 (0x00002aaaab75d000)
    	/lib64/ld-linux-x86-64.so.2 (0x0000003c5b200000)
